Redstar
Music App Marketplace
Napster
Peer-to-peer DRM

Napster was the seminal app that revolutionized peer-to-peer sharing of mp3 files and ushered the collapse of the music industry as we knew it. After the RIAA won its piracy lawsuit against the embattled startup, the major record labels invested $60 million to rebuild the Napster brand into a legal, paid consumer music service. I worked with the developers to design the digital rights management interface for the new application.
User Experience
Wireframes
QA

Click or touch and drag

Ruckus
College Music App

Ruckus was the legal version of Napster for college students to share music on campus. Costs for the music were covered under tuition bills with the majority of revenues going to the music rights holders. I worked closely with the founders to design version 1 of this desktop app.
User Experience
Wireframes
UI Design
Prototype

Click or touch and drag

GetMusic
Music Ecommerce Site

GetMusic.com was a music ecommerce Web site funded by a cooperation between Universal Music Group and Bertelsmann Music Group. Originally developed by a large agency, the site was underperforming, and I was hired to redesign it helping increase sales by 200%.
User Experience
Wireframes
UI Design
Client-side Development
QA

Click or touch and drag

BMG Music
Music Subscription Service

BMG Music Service was one of the most trafficked music ecommerce sites of its day with unique offers and designs customized for each listening preference. Extended from a direct marketing lineage, it made liberal use of data-driven, multivariate testing to iterate new features. I was hired as the first UI Lead working closely with Marketing Managers to acquire and retain millions of paid subscribers.
User Experience
Wireframes
UI Design
Client-side Development
QA

Click or touch and drag

DWS
Music Ecommerce API

DWS
Digital World Services
Digital World Services is the European market leader for DRM-enabled music and video content delivery. I worked with the CEO to plan the user experience and design a co-branded, customizable interface for its partner API allowing for commerce vendors to offer a catalog of digital music to their customers.
User Experience
Wireframes
UI Design

Click or touch and drag

Vcross
Bond Trading Platform

Vcross was a bond trading platform enabling institutional traders to transact instruments in excess of $100 million. I worked with the founders to pioneering the first real-time, Web-based bidding engine (BidLaddertm). I also directed a team of designers and writers to produce their branding and marketing collateral, including Web and print media.
User Experience
Wireframes
Hi-def Prototypes
UI Design
Programming
QA

Click or touch and drag

Jemstep
Financial Investment Service

Jemstep is a service for retail investors to import and evaluate all their mutual funds in one place. The service includes an unbiased fund-rating system based on a wealth of data pooled from diverse sources. I helped the founders redesign their marketing Web site and advised on the product's UX and UI design.
Web Marketing Design
User Experience
Wireframes
UI Design

Click or touch and drag

Sabre
Travel Mobile Apps

Best-known as the company behind Travelocity, Sabre Travel Network is a leading travel technology provider with over 50 million customers in the U.S. I helped Sabre's Mobile Strategy Group design and produce hi-def prototypes for concept apps targeting iPad and smartphones.
User Experience
Wireframes
Hi-def Prototypes

Objectlab
Software Consultancy

Objectlab is a technology strategy and software development agency. I've worked with them on and off for over 12 years on numerous projects, including branding and Web marketing for their company.
